name: SubLiminal
description:
The Game!

SubLiminal is a shoot 'em up game inspired by my Mom's love of Galaga. This game is all about precision and fighting through wave after wave of powerful and strange alien ships!

Features
  • online leaderboards
  • over 20 different enemies
  • procedurally generated waves
  • 3 crazy bosses(including a giant alien snake thing...)
  • fast-paced space action!
  • retro-arcade CRT graphics <3
LeaderBoard

Contact Me!

Contact me on twitter @cbear_wallis if you wanna talk <3 and thanks if you buy the game ^_^

You may contact the wonderful musician @ben_burnes on twitter! Also here's his site: http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
